feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 09:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: E 53 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area this morning. Wind becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
